item.title: Clustering: cereals, supermarket shelves, and sugar
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 4 Hierarchical clustering 5 K-means clustering 6 Estimating K empirically with the elbow method 7 Estimating k empirically with silhouette analysis 8 Results 9 Conclusion 1 Summary To see the all the code used in this post, visit my GitHub repository for this site Objectives: To find what what kind of clusters are there in the cereals dataset available on Kaggle.
